text: Front-end developer who designs and builds responsive, user-friendly web and mobile apps, specialising in JavaScript and React.
Skilled in UX/UI design including user stories, user flows, wireframes, prototypes, colour schemes and UI components.
Experience building and integrating back-end systems, including APIs, databases and headless CMS.
Worked in agile product development teams delivering UX/UI solutions for SaaS applications.
10 years experience as a designer, skilled in Figma, Adobe and other design / prototyping tools.
